00090         GLM_ALIGNED_STRUCT(16) fvec4SIMD
00091         {
00092                 enum ctor{null};
00093                 typedef __m128 value_type;
00094                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00095                 static size_type value_size();
00096 
00097                 typedef fvec4SIMD type;
00098                 typedef tvec4<bool, highp> bool_type;
00099 
00100 #ifdef GLM_SIMD_ENABLE_XYZW_UNION
00101                 union
00102                 {
00103                         __m128 Data;
00104                         struct {float x, y, z, w;};
00105                 };
00106 #else
00107                 __m128 Data;
00108 #endif
00109 
00111                 // Implicit basic constructors
00112 
00113                 fvec4SIMD();
00114                 fvec4SIMD(__m128 const & Data);
00115                 fvec4SIMD(fvec4SIMD const & v);
00116 
00118                 // Explicit basic constructors
00119 
00120                 explicit fvec4SIMD(
00121                         ctor);
00122                 explicit fvec4SIMD(
00123                         float const & s);
00124                 explicit fvec4SIMD(
00125                         float const & x, 
00126                         float const & y, 
00127                         float const & z, 
00128                         float const & w);
00129                 explicit fvec4SIMD(
00130                         vec4 const & v);
00131 
00134 
00135                 fvec4SIMD(vec2 const & v, float const & s1, float const & s2);
00136                 fvec4SIMD(float const & s1, vec2 const & v, float const & s2);
00137                 fvec4SIMD(float const & s1, float const & s2, vec2 const & v);
00138                 fvec4SIMD(vec3 const & v, float const & s);
00139                 fvec4SIMD(float const & s, vec3 const & v);
00140                 fvec4SIMD(vec2 const & v1, vec2 const & v2);
00141                 //fvec4SIMD(ivec4SIMD const & v);
00142 
00144                 // Unary arithmetic operators
00145 
00146                 fvec4SIMD& operator= (fvec4SIMD const & v);
00147                 fvec4SIMD& operator+=(fvec4SIMD const & v);
00148                 fvec4SIMD& operator-=(fvec4SIMD const & v);
00149                 fvec4SIMD& operator*=(fvec4SIMD const & v);
00150                 fvec4SIMD& operator/=(fvec4SIMD const & v);
00151 
00152                 fvec4SIMD& operator+=(float const & s);
00153                 fvec4SIMD& operator-=(float const & s);
00154                 fvec4SIMD& operator*=(float const & s);
00155                 fvec4SIMD& operator/=(float const & s);
00156 
00157                 fvec4SIMD& operator++();
00158                 fvec4SIMD& operator--();
00159 
00161                 // Swizzle operators
00162 
00163                 template <comp X, comp Y, comp Z, comp W>
00164                 fvec4SIMD& swizzle();
00165                 template <comp X, comp Y, comp Z, comp W>
00166                 fvec4SIMD swizzle() const;
00167                 template <comp X, comp Y, comp Z>
00168                 fvec4SIMD swizzle() const;
00169                 template <comp X, comp Y>
00170                 fvec4SIMD swizzle() const;
00171                 template <comp X>
00172                 fvec4SIMD swizzle() const;
00173         };
